mapper.insert: insert into FILE ( idx_file_info, file_name, file_type, file_status, mime_type, encoding, extention, file_secure_type, file_path, file_size, checksum, owner, idx_user, idx_admin, reg_date ) values ( #{idx_file_info}, #{file_name}, #{file_type}, #{file_status}, #{mime_type}, #{encoding}, #{extention}, #{file_secure_type}, #{file_path}, #{file_size}, #{checksum}, #{owner}, #{idx_user}, #{idx_admin}, #{reg_date} )
